title: Historian on a photograph workers - cause

content.prompt: Which of the following most directly led to the changes described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Innovative uses of photography to achieve social change
Technological innovations in the production of goods
The economic hardship resulting from years of civil war in the United States
The end of the apprenticeship system in craft work

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
